thread.title: KNK To Hold Record-Length 12-Hour Live Broadcast
thread.title_full: KNK To Hold Record-Length 12-Hour Live Broadcast

author: kiddy_days
title: KNK To Hold Record-Length 12-Hour Live Broadcast
text:
Shares 569 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
On March 17, KNK will hold a Naver V Live broadcast starting from 6 p.m. KST on March 17 to 6 a.m. KST on March 18. 
The live broadcast will have the members “camping indoors.” The members will show their natural selves while they cook, play games, sleep, and wake up through a selfie format. The KNK members were enthusiastic in contributing their ideas to the broadcast, promising for a fun 12 hours. 
KNK recently celebrated their first debut anniversary and revealed their official fan club colors . 
You can catch KNK’s big challenge at 6 p.m. KST on March 17 through their channel.
